Subscribe to be notified when a transaction is stored (if acted as welcome node)


```graphql
transactionConfirmed(
  address: Address!
): TransactionAttestation
```


### Arguments

#### [<code style={{ fontWeight: 'normal' }}>transactionConfirmed.<b>address</b></code>](#)<Bullet />[`Address!`](/build/api/schema/scalars/address) <Badge class="secondary" text="non-null"/> <Badge class="secondary" text="scalar"/>
> 
> 

### Type

#### [`TransactionAttestation`](/build/api/schema/objects/transaction-attestation) <Badge class="secondary" text="object"/>
> [TransactionAttestation] represents an attestation when a transaction is successfully validated and stored.
Few attestations can be received with differents confirmations to ensure a better security of the replication.

>
